spells.html_content:
Spells

Mutilation
/ Punishment
0 Range / 2AP

Sacrifices some of the caster's health to increase their Power.
At the start of each turn, sacrifices some of their health again to increment their Mutilation state as long as the spell is active.

Casting the spell again removes the applied effects and casts the Coagulation spell:
• Applies a shield on the caster.
• The shield is greater based on the Mutilation state.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.
Required level: :
10|77|144

Normal effects

-10% HP (infinite)
50 Power (infinite)
'Mutilation I' state (infinite)
'Mutilation II' state (infinite)
'Mutilation III' state (infinite)
Coagulation
10% of HP to shield (1 turn)
20% of HP to shield (1 turn)
30% of HP to shield (1 turn)

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Uses per turn
1
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
No
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes

spells.html_content:
Spells

Thorn Crown
/ Pillory
0 Range / 2AP

Applies the Gravity state on targets in an area of effect, a shield and the Thorn Crown state on the caster:
• Reflects 100% of final damage suffered in close combat back at adjacent enemies.

If the caster is at Suffering 6 or more, applies the Martyr's Thorn Crown state on the caster:
• Applies an additional shield on the caster for each enemy in the area of effect.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.
Required level: :
45|112|179

Normal effects

10% of HP to shield (1 turn)

'Martyr's Thorn Crown' state (1 turn)

No effect for this spell

5

No
Target necessary
Yes

Cross of 1 cell

details.description:
Makes the caster and their Swords Unlockable and increases their MP.

The effects are greater if the caster is at Suffering 6 or more and cannot be unbewitched.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Pillory
/ Thorn Crown
4 Range / 2AP

Increases the target's ranged resistances and applies the Unmovable and Pillory states on it:
• Removes the spell's effects if the target suffers close-combat damage, and heals the caster.

If the caster is at Suffering 6 or more, applies the Martyr's Pillory state on the target:
• The effects can no longer be removed.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.
Required level: :
155

Blood Ties
/ Transfusion
1 - 5 Range / 2AP

Moves the caster closer to the target and applies the Blood Ties state on the targeted enemy:
• Moves the caster closer to the targeted enemy if the caster suffers enemy damage.

The immediate movement is greater and the spell's maximum range is increased by 4 if the caster is at Suffering 6 or more.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Jashin Ritual
/ Berserk
1 - 10 Range / 3AP

Applies the Jashin Ritual state on the targeted enemy and places a glyph-aura under the caster that applies the state to the caster and makes the caster Unlockable.
As long as the caster and the target are in this state, reflects all damage suffered by the caster onto the target and vice versa.
Required level: :
195

Places a glyph-aura (2 turns)
